overview: How aware are we that despite the constant flow of information, we only perceive our own clutter of information through which we form our worldview? And why are we so sure of it? Through all this awareness, how much do we really perceive that the news from our media space is just an approximation of real events? And isn't the real news just over the hill? â€¦ A report about a shepherd, sheep, and a radio in the high mountains.
title: Behind the Horizon
